titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 899) to provide for additional safeguards with respect to imposing Federal mandates, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 899) to provide for additional safeguards with respect to imposing Federal mandates, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-362, by Ms. Foxx.
The resolution provides for one hour of debate. The resolution makes in order only those amendments printed in the report. The resolution provides one motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 87.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 492.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 192 (Roll no. 79).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 190 (Roll no. 80).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 899) to provide for additional safeguards with respect to imposing Federal mandates.
